titles: A letter of friendly admonition to a divine of the Synod, upon occasion of a sermon preached by him, Octob. 18, 1647 together, with certaine qu√¶res presented to the Synod : wherein the maine objections against the Common-prayer set forth in the preface to the late Directory are examined : together, with other acts that have been done against the suffering party of this kingdome : and the answer of the Synod desired thereunto / by a hearty wel-wisher to truth & peace, T.W.
author: T. W.
Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
notes: Wrongly ascribed in Wing to George Savile, Marquis of Halifax.
Imperfect: 32 pages at end lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
